title: 86/140/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 April 1986 amending Decision 85/331/EEC on the sale in the Isle of Man of butter in intervention storage in the United Kingdom
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 8 April 1986
amending Decision 85/331/EEC on the sale in the Isle of Man of butter in intervention storage in the United Kingdom
(Only the English text is authentic)
(86/140/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 (2) of Decision 85/331/EEC, '31 March 1986' is hereby replaced by '31 March 1987'.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 April 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 362, 31. 12. 1985, p. 8.
(3) OJ No L 173, 3. 7. 1985, p. 24.
